The total rain was 2 inches + 1 inches = <<2+1=3>>3 inches on Monday.
The total rain was 2 * 3 inches = <<2*3=6>>6 inches on Tuesday.
The total rain was 0 inches + 1 inch = <<0+1=1>>1 inch across Wednesday and Thursday.
The total rain was 3 inches + 6 inches + 1 inch = <<3+6+1=15>>15 inches on Friday.
There were 3 inches + 6 inches + 1 inch + 15 inches = <<3+6+1+15=25>>25 inches total last week.
25 inches/5 days = <<25/5=5>>5 inches average daily rain.
